item.title: Excel Processing using Pandas
item.description: A brief summary of how to read and write excel files using Pandas package.

item.title: How to Read and Write CSV Files in Python
item.description: In this post, I will summarize the most convenient way to read and write CSV files (with or w/o headers) in Python. Write CSV files Use the builtin CSV writer Python has a built-in CSV module that deals with CSV files. In order to write to files in CSV format, we build a CSV writer, then write to a file using this writer. Here is a simple example: import csv lines = [['Bob', 'male', '27'], ['Smith', 'male', '26'], ['Alice', 'female', '26']] header = ['name', 'gender', 'age'] with open("test.
